# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here's a simple implementation of the `wrap_string` function:
```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width)
    # Split text into words
    words = split(text)

    # Iterate over words and add new line when text width is exceeded
    for i in 1:length(words)
        word = words[i]
        if length(word) > text_width
            println()
            println(word)
        else
            println(word)
        end
    end
end
